overview:
About SoMedia Networks

SoMedia Networks is a pioneer of cloud-based video content production platforms and massive scale video production services. We provide resale, white-label, and on-demand video production services to web services companies, digital publishers, agencies, corporate brands and broadcasters across North America.

Our technology-first approach, and North American-wide crowd sourced workforce allows us to provide a range of ground breaking video production services and products which break down the traditional barriers of cost, volume and reach, making it easy for our partners to deliver online video products to their clients simply and affordably, anywhere, at scale.

Our Unique Video-as-a-Product Approach

Video production is a creative, complex, expensive process. Through cloud-based platform innovations we’ve turned online video into scalable, inexpensive products. From corporate testimonials, ads and profiles to branded news stories, b-roll clips, and local event coverage, our BBN3 video platform allows us to create affordable, turnkey online video solutions from concept to completion.

Our Reseller Approach

Most vendors sell video direct. Some offer outsourced services. At SoMedia, we provide web services companies – web designers & developers, SEM & SEO companies, digital agencies – with a turnkey, end-to-end channel partner program making it easy and profitable for them to sell video products to their SMB customers. We train them to sell video products, we equip them with customized, marketing & sales collateral, we keep them informed on the video marketing space and we offer them ongoing sales and technical support.
